channel.title: ROP Emporium on d3bo
channel.description: Recent content in ROP Emporium on d3bo

item.title: fluff
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python3 from pwn import * e = ELF("./fluff") context.binary = e # Set the target binary for pwntools context.terminal = ["kitty", "-e"] # Terminal to use for GDB debugging HOST = "10.

item.title: write4
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python3 from pwn import * exe = ELF("./write4") libc = ELF("./libwrite4.so") context.binary = exe context.terminal = ['tmux', 'splitw', '-h'] gdb_script = """ b main b *0x0000000000400691 b *0x0000000000400629 continue """ def conn(): if args.

item.title: split
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python3 from pwn import * exe = ELF("./split_patched") context.binary = exe def conn(): if args.LOCAL: r = process([exe.path]) if args.

item.title: ret2win
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python3 from pwn import * exe = ELF("./ret2win_patched") context.binary = exe def conn(): if args.LOCAL: r = process([exe.path]) if args.

item.title: callme
item.description: { setvbuf(_bss_start, 0LL, 2, 0LL); puts("callme by ROP Emporium"); puts("x86_64\n"); pwnme(); puts("\nExiting"); return 0; } La función main llama a la función pwnme().

item.title: badchars
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python3 from pwn import * exe = ELF("./badchars") context.binary = exe context.terminal = ["alacritty", "-e"] gdb_script = """ b main b *0x000000000040069c continue """ def conn(): if args.
